Posts.Content: Oct 17, 2012 11:57AM Esparro wrote: Hello to all my October gals! I too just received my surgery date earlier this week. It's set for Tuesday 10/23/12! I decided to have a double mastectomy, with immediate recon, DIEP procedure (I'm excited about that part, but not looking forward to the recovery). I'm getting so nervous!!! I got so much shopping/preparing after reading all the tips for post op. I was just diagnosed in July, and the waiting part has been KILLING me! I'm glad I finally have a surgery date. I wish all my October girls a speedy recovery! God Bless :)
Posts.Title: October 2012 Surgery? Leigh22 ConnieGreene
